name: EBMIG
publisher: HL7 International - Clinical Decision Support WG

contact.name: HL7 International - Clinical Decision Support WG

resource.name: Adaptation
resource.description: Profile of ArtifactAssessment for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The Adaptation Profile is used for assessments of a knowledge artifact that are used to create a new knowledge artifact through acceptance, rejection or modification of the assessed artifact.

resource.name: ArtifactApprovalDate
resource.description: When the resource was approved by publisher.

resource.name: ArtifactAssessmentCompared
resource.description: The artifact being compared to the referenced artifact.

resource.name: ArtifactAssessmentDateAsRating
resource.description: A date or dateTime value as the classifier or rating value.

resource.name: ArtifactEffectivePeriod
resource.description: The period during which the resource content was or is planned to be in active use.

resource.name: ArtifactLastReviewDate
resource.description: When the resource was approved by publisher.

resource.name: BaselineMeasureEvidence
resource.description: Profile of Evidence for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The BaselineMeasureEvidence Profile is used for evidence with a measured variable (with the role of outcome for this Evidence) that is considered an independent variable with respect to the outcome of an exposure or intervention in a study.

resource.name: BookCitation
resource.description: Profile of Citation for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The BookCitation Profile is used for citations of a book.

resource.name: BookPartCitation
resource.description: Profile of Citation for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The BookPartCitation Profile is used for citations of a part of a book.

resource.name: CertaintyOfEvidence
resource.description: Profile of ArtifactAssessment for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The CertaintyOfEvidence Profile is used for expression of the certainty (also called quality or confidence in the estimates) of an Evidence artifact.

resource.name: CharacteristicDescription
resource.description: Natural language description of the characteristic.

resource.name: CharacteristicDeterminedByExpression
resource.description: Method for how the characteristic value was determined.

resource.name: CharacteristicDeterminedByReference
resource.description: Method for how the characteristic value was determined.

resource.name: CharacteristicDurationDuration
resource.description: Length of time in which the characteristic is met.

resource.name: CharacteristicDurationRange
resource.description: Length of time in which the characteristic is met.

resource.name: CharacteristicInstancesQuantity
resource.description: Number of occurrences meeting the characteristic.

resource.name: CharacteristicInstancesRange
resource.description: Number of occurrences meeting the characteristic.

resource.name: CharacteristicMethod
resource.description: Method for how the characteristic value was determined.

resource.name: CharacteristicOffset
resource.description: Defines the reference point for comparison when other than 0.

resource.name: CharacteristicTiming
resource.description: Timing in which the characteristic is determined.

resource.name: CharacteristicValueExpression
resource.description: The value of the trait that holds for members of the group, held by Expression.

resource.name: CharacteristicValueUri
resource.description: The value of the trait that holds for members of the group, held by uri.

resource.name: Classification
resource.description: Profile of ArtifactAssessment for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The Classification Profile is used for classifier tags that may be created independently from Resource creators and may be used for search indexes.

resource.name: Cohort Definition
resource.description: Profile of Group for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The CohortDefinition Profile is used to provide a conceptual or definitional representation of a Group.

resource.name: CombinationMethod
resource.description: Used to specify how two or more characteristics are combined.

resource.name: CombinationThreshold
resource.description: Provides the value of n when at-least or at-most codes are used for combinationMethod.

resource.name: Comment
resource.description: Profile of ArtifactAssessment for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The Comment Profile is used for comments about a Resource that may be created independently from Resource creators.

resource.name: ComparativeBaselineMeasureEvidence
resource.description: Profile of Evidence for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The ComparativeBaselineMeasureEvidence Profile is used for comparative evidence with a measured variable (with the role of outcome for this Evidence) that is considered an independent variable with respect to the outcome of an exposure or intervention in a study.

resource.name: ComparativeEvidence
resource.description: Profile of Evidence for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The ComparativeEvidence Profile is used for evidence with a measured variable that is considered the outcome of an exposure or intervention, and an exposure variable with two or more categories that are being compared.

resource.name: ComparativeEvidenceReport
resource.description: Profile of Composition for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The ComparativeEvidenceReport Profile is used for an evidence report including the study group, exposure, comparator, and findings for any number of outcomes comparing the exposure to the comparator in the study group.

resource.name: ComparativeEvidenceReportSubject
resource.description: Profile of Group for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The EvidenceReportSubject Profile is used to define the subject of an EvidenceReport.

resource.name: ComparativeParticipantFlow
resource.description: Profile of Evidence for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The ComparativeParticipantFlow Profile is used for comparisons of counts of completion and reasons for non-completion of participation in a research study.

resource.name: ComparatorDefinition
resource.description: Profile of Group for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The ComparatorDefinition Profile is used to express the criteria defining a reference group for comparison.

resource.name: ComparatorGroup
resource.description: Profile of Group for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The ComparatorGroup Profile is used to represent a group (definitional or enumerated) used as a comparator in a ComparativeEvidence.

resource.name: ComparatorOnlyEvidence
resource.description: Profile of Evidence for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The ComparatorOnlyEvidence Profile is used for evidence with a measured variable that is considered the outcome of an exposure or intervention, and a population that has an exposure with a categorical value that is the reference category for the exposure in a ComparativeEvidence Profile. The ComparatorOnlyEvidence describes the evidence for the comparator group.

resource.name: Comparison
resource.description: Profile of ArtifactAssessment for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The Comparison Profile is used for assessments of similarities and differences between knowledge artifacts.

resource.name: CompositeRating
resource.description: Profile of ArtifactAssessment for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The CompositeRating Profile is used for a composite rating or classification of a Resource that may be created following ratings or classifications by two or more parties.

resource.name: DatabaseCitation
resource.description: Profile of Citation for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The DatabaseCitation Profile is used for citations of a database.

resource.name: DatabaseEntryCitation
resource.description: Profile of Citation for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The DatabaseEntryCitation Profile is used for citations of a record within a database.

resource.name: DataDictionary
resource.description: Profile of CodeSystem for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The DataDictionary Profile is used for a code key for variable names in a dataset.

resource.name: DatasetCitation
resource.description: Profile of Citation for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The DatasetCitation Profile is used for citations of a dataset.

resource.name: DateAsRating
resource.description: Profile of ArtifactAssessment for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The DateAsRating Profile is used for representing a date or dateTime as a classifier value.

resource.name: EndpointAnalysisPlan
resource.description: Profile of Evidence for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The EndpointAnalysisPlan Profile is used for specification of the statistical model for analysis of a single endpoint.

resource.name: Evidence Variable Role Subtype Value Set
resource.description: The sub-role that the variable plays.

resource.name: EvidenceList
resource.description: Profile of List for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The EvidenceList Profile is used to provide a list of Evidence Resources. The EvidenceList Profile is used to represent a Group of Evidence for the population for an EvidenceSynthesisEvidence using a summary data meta-analysis approach and is referenced from a MetaanalysisStudyGroup.

resource.name: EvidenceMap
resource.description: Profile of Composition for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The EvidenceMap Profile is used for an organized listing of Resources used to generate EvidenceReport instances.

resource.name: EvidenceR6
resource.description: Profile of Evidence for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The EvidenceR6 Profile is used to adjust the R5 Evidence base to match the structures in R6.

resource.name: EvidenceReport
resource.description: Profile of Composition for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The EvidenceReport Profile is used for a base structure (canonical resource management) for a report combining any number of Citation, Evidence, EvidenceVariable, EvidenceReport, and related Resources.

resource.name: EvidenceReportSubject
resource.description: Profile of Group for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The EvidenceReportSubject Profile is used to define the subject of an EvidenceReport.

resource.name: EvidenceSynthesisEvidence
resource.description: Profile of Evidence for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The EvidenceSynthesisEvidence Profile is used for evidence that is combined from two or more studies, explicitly expressing the method by which evidence was synthesized.

resource.name: EvidenceVariableCategoryValueReference
resource.description: Reference to a Group Resource to express a definition for a categorical value.

resource.name: EvidenceVariableDefinition
resource.description: Reference to a CodeableConcept and/or a Group Resource to express a definition for an EvidenceVariable.

resource.name: ExposureDefinition
resource.description: Profile of Group for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The ExposureDefinition Profile is used to express the criteria defining an evidence variable (or categorical value for a variable) in the role of exposure.

resource.name: ExposureGroup
resource.description: Profile of Group for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The ExposureGroup Profile is used to represent a group (definitional or enumerated) used in a ComparativeEvidence.

resource.name: ExposureVariable
resource.description: Profile of EvidenceVariable for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The ExposureVariable Profile is used to classify an EvidenceVariable as an exposure (e.g. an intervention or independent variable of primary interest) for use in implementations that manage exposures differently than outcomes.

resource.name: GroupAssignment
resource.description: Profile of EvidenceVariable for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The GroupAssignment Profile is used to classify an EvidenceVariable as an exposure managed as a categorical variable. The variable definitions are found in the category element instead of the definition element.

resource.name: GroupR6
resource.description: Profile of Group for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The GroupR6 Profile is used to adjust the R5 Group base to match the structures in R6.

resource.name: Guideline
resource.description: Profile of Composition for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The Guideline Profile is used for the composition of a clinical practice guideline and may be tightly related to use of Recommendation Profile of Composition for related content.

resource.name: InterventionOnlyEvidence
resource.description: Profile of Evidence for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The InterventionOnlyEvidence Profile is used for evidence with a measured variable that is considered the outcome of an exposure or intervention. The InterventionOnlyEvidence describes the evidence for the intervention group.

resource.name: JournalArticleCitation
resource.description: Profile of Citation for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The JournalArticleCitation Profile is used for citations of an article published in a periodical venue classified as a journal.

resource.name: M11Section01
resource.description: Profile of Composition for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The M11Section01 Profile is used for summary of Section 1 Protocol Summary for the International Council for Harmonisation of Technical Requirements for Pharmaceuticals for Human Use (ICH) Clinical Electronic Structured Harmonised Protocol (CeSHarP) M11 Technical Specification.

resource.name: M11Section02
resource.description: Profile of Composition for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The M11Section02 Profile is used for summary of Section 2 Introduction for the International Council for Harmonisation of Technical Requirements for Pharmaceuticals for Human Use (ICH) Clinical Electronic Structured Harmonised Protocol (CeSHarP) M11 Technical Specification.

resource.name: M11Section03
resource.description: Profile of Composition for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The M11Section03 Profile is used for summary of Section 3 Trial Objectives, Endpoints and Estimands for the International Council for Harmonisation of Technical Requirements for Pharmaceuticals for Human Use (ICH) Clinical Electronic Structured Harmonised Protocol (CeSHarP) M11 Technical Specification.

resource.name: M11Section04
resource.description: Profile of Composition for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The M11Section04 Profile is used for summary of Section 4 Trial Design for the International Council for Harmonisation of Technical Requirements for Pharmaceuticals for Human Use (ICH) Clinical Electronic Structured Harmonised Protocol (CeSHarP) M11 Technical Specification.

resource.name: M11Section05
resource.description: Profile of Composition for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The M11Section05 Profile is used for summary of Section 5 Trial Population for the International Council for Harmonisation of Technical Requirements for Pharmaceuticals for Human Use (ICH) Clinical Electronic Structured Harmonised Protocol (CeSHarP) M11 Technical Specification.

resource.name: M11Section06
resource.description: Profile of Composition for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The M11Section06 Profile is used for summary of Section 6 Trial Intervention for the International Council for Harmonisation of Technical Requirements for Pharmaceuticals for Human Use (ICH) Clinical Electronic Structured Harmonised Protocol (CeSHarP) M11 Technical Specification.

resource.name: M11Section07
resource.description: Profile of Composition for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The M11Section07 Profile is used for summary of Section 7 Participant Discontinuation of Trial Intervention and Withdrawal from Trial for the International Council for Harmonisation of Technical Requirements for Pharmaceuticals for Human Use (ICH) Clinical Electronic Structured Harmonised Protocol (CeSHarP) M11 Technical Specification.

resource.name: M11Section08
resource.description: Profile of Composition for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The M11Section08 Profile is used for summary of Section 8 Trial Assessments and Procedures for the International Council for Harmonisation of Technical Requirements for Pharmaceuticals for Human Use (ICH) Clinical Electronic Structured Harmonised Protocol (CeSHarP) M11 Technical Specification.

resource.name: M11Section09
resource.description: Profile of Composition for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The M11Section09 Profile is used for summary of Section 9 Adverse Events, Serious Adverse Events, and Product Complaints for the International Council for Harmonisation of Technical Requirements for Pharmaceuticals for Human Use (ICH) Clinical Electronic Structured Harmonised Protocol (CeSHarP) M11 Technical Specification.

resource.name: M11Section10
resource.description: Profile of Composition for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The M11Section10 Profile is used for summary of Section 10 Statistical Considerations for the International Council for Harmonisation of Technical Requirements for Pharmaceuticals for Human Use (ICH) Clinical Electronic Structured Harmonised Protocol (CeSHarP) M11 Technical Specification.

resource.name: M11Section11
resource.description: Profile of Composition for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The M11Section11 Profile is used for summary of Section 11 General Considerations: Regulatory, Ethical, and Trial Oversight for the International Council for Harmonisation of Technical Requirements for Pharmaceuticals for Human Use (ICH) Clinical Electronic Structured Harmonised Protocol (CeSHarP) M11 Technical Specification.

resource.name: M11Section12
resource.description: Profile of Composition for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The M11Section12 Profile is used for summary of Section 12 General Considerations: Risk Management and Data Governance for the International Council for Harmonisation of Technical Requirements for Pharmaceuticals for Human Use (ICH) Clinical Electronic Structured Harmonised Protocol (CeSHarP) M11 Technical Specification.

resource.name: M11Section13
resource.description: Profile of Composition for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The M11Section13 Profile is used for summary of Section 13 Appendix: Definitions and Supporting Operational Details for the International Council for Harmonisation of Technical Requirements for Pharmaceuticals for Human Use (ICH) Clinical Electronic Structured Harmonised Protocol (CeSHarP) M11 Technical Specification.

resource.name: M11Section14
resource.description: Profile of Composition for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The M11Section14 Profile is used for summary of Section 14 Appendix: Glossary of Terms for the International Council for Harmonisation of Technical Requirements for Pharmaceuticals for Human Use (ICH) Clinical Electronic Structured Harmonised Protocol (CeSHarP) M11 Technical Specification.

resource.name: M11Section15
resource.description: Profile of Composition for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The M11Section15 Profile is used for summary of Section 15 Appendix: References for the International Council for Harmonisation of Technical Requirements for Pharmaceuticals for Human Use (ICH) Clinical Electronic Structured Harmonised Protocol (CeSHarP) M11 Technical Specification.

resource.name: MetaanalysisEligibilityCriteria
resource.description: Profile of Group for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The MetaanalysisEligibilityCriteria Profile is used to describe inclusion and exclusion criteria for a meta-analysis.

resource.name: MetaanalysisOutcomeDefinition
resource.description: Profile of Group for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The MetaanalysisOutcomeDefinition Profile is used to express the criteria defining an evidence variable in the role of outcome where the population (dataset) is a set of Evidence Resources. Characteristics define the characteristics of the Evidence Resource to be eligible to be used for this outcome.

resource.name: MetaanalysisStudyGroup
resource.description: Profile of Group for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The MetaanalysisStudyGroup Profile is used to represent an enumerated group of participants in a meta-analysis where the participants are Evidence Resources and the Group membership is conceptual.

resource.name: NetEffectContribution
resource.description: Profile of Evidence for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The NetEffectContribution Profile is used for evidence in which the effect estimates, expressed as risk differences, is multiplied by a relative importance rating of the outcomes.

resource.name: NetEffectContributionList
resource.description: Profile of List for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The NetEffectContributionList Profile is used to provide a list of Evidence Resources (NetEffectContribution Profile). The NetEffectContributionList Profile is used to represent a Group of Evidence for the population for a NetEffectEstimate (Profile of Evidence) using a net effect analysis approach and is referenced from a NetEffectContributions (Profile of Group).

resource.name: NetEffectContributions
resource.description: Profile of Group for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The NetEffectContributions Profile is used to represent an enumerated group of participants in a net effect analysis where the participants are Evidence Resources (NetEffectContribution Profile) and the Group membership is conceptual.

resource.name: NetEffectEstimate
resource.description: Profile of Evidence for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The NetEffectEstimate Profile is used for evidence in which the observed data is net effect contributions (effect estimates expressed as risk differences, multiplied by relative importance ratings of outcomes).

resource.name: NonComparativeEvidence
resource.description: Profile of Evidence for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The NonComparativeEvidence Profile is used for evidence about a single group with no comparisons between groups.

resource.name: OutcomeDefinition
resource.description: Profile of Group for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The OutcomeDefinition Profile is used to express the criteria defining an evidence variable (or categorical value for a variable) in the role of outcome.

resource.name: OutcomeImportance
resource.description: Profile of ArtifactAssessment for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The OutcomeImportance Profile is used for expression of the relative importance of an outcome. The outcome is typically expressed with an EvidenceVariable Resource and may use the OutcomeVariable Profile of EvidenceVariable (or OutcomeDefinition Profile of Group).

resource.name: OutcomeList
resource.description: Profile of List for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The OutcomeList Profile is used to provide a list of outcomes. The OutcomeList Profile is referenced in the EvidenceReportSubject Profile as a way to define the set of outcomes that an EvidenceReport is about.

resource.name: OutcomeMeasureEvidence
resource.description: Profile of Evidence for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The OutcomeMeasureEvidence Profile is used for evidence with a measured variable that is considered the outcome of an exposure or intervention.

resource.name: OutcomeVariable
resource.description: Profile of EvidenceVariable for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The OutcomeVariable Profile is used to classify an EvidenceVariable as an outcome or dependent variable for use in implementations that manage exposures differently than outcomes.

resource.name: Participant Flow Measure
resource.description: Profile of EvidenceVariable for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The ParticipantFlowMeasure Profile is used to describe outcome measures for completion and reasons for non-completion of participation in a research study.

resource.name: ParticipantFlow
resource.description: Profile of Evidence for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The ParticipantFlow Profile is used for counts of completion and reasons for non-completion of participation in a research study.

resource.name: PreprintCitation
resource.description: Profile of Citation for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The PreprintCitation Profile is used for citations of an article published in a form prior to peer-reviewed publication in a journal, book, or other permanent record.

resource.name: Rating
resource.description: Profile of ArtifactAssessment for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The Rating Profile is used for classifier tags that may include quantitative ratings and may be created independently from Resource creators.

resource.name: Recommendation
resource.description: Profile of Composition for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The Recommendation Profile is used for the composition of a recommendation (such as that from a clinical practice guideline) and may be tightly related to a RecommendationPlan Profile of PlanDefinition and a RecommendationJustification Profile of ArtifactAssessment.

resource.name: RecommendationAction
resource.description: Profile of ActivityDefinition for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The RecommendationAction Profile is used for a recommendation from a clinical practice guideline.

resource.name: RecommendationEligibilityCriteria
resource.description: Profile of Group for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The RecommendationEligibilityCriteria Profile is used to express the criteria defining a group for whom a recommendation applies.

resource.name: RecommendationJustification
resource.description: Profile of ArtifactAssessment for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The RecommendationJustification Profile is used for expressing the rationale, evidence, and judgments supporting a recommendation, such as from a clinical practice guideline.

resource.name: RecommendationPlan
resource.description: Profile of PlanDefinition for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The RecommendationPlan Profile is used for the implementable representation of a recommendation (such as that from a clinical practice guideline).

resource.name: Risk Of Bias Type Value Set
resource.description: Types of bias for used with risk of bias assessment.

resource.name: RiskOfBias
resource.description: Profile of ArtifactAssessment for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The RiskOfBias Profile is used for expression of the assessment of the threats to validity (or risk of bias) of an Evidence artifact or an artifact consisting of Evidence or the plan to create Evidence.

resource.name: SearchResults
resource.description: Profile of Library for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The SearchResults Profile is used to represent search results, such as for a systematic review.

resource.name: SearchStrategy
resource.description: Profile of Group for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The SearchStrategy Profile is used to express the criteria defining a search strategy, such as for a systematic review.

resource.name: SingleStudyEvidence
resource.description: Profile of Evidence for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The SingleStudyEvidence Profile is used for evidence from single studies, explicitly expressing that no studies were synthesized.

resource.name: SoaPlanDefinition
resource.description: Profile of PlanDefinition for temporary testing to coordination with M11 use.

resource.name: SoftwareCitation
resource.description: Profile of Citation for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The SoftwareCitation Profile is used for citations of executable code.

resource.name: StatisticModelApplied
resource.description: The analysis that was applied.

resource.name: StatisticModelAttributeEstimate
resource.description: An attribute of the statistic used as a model characteristic.

resource.name: StatisticModelIncludeIf
resource.description: The condition under which the variable (or modelCharacteristic) will be included.

resource.name: StatisticModelIntended
resource.description: The plan for analysis.

resource.name: StatisticModelModelCharacteristic
resource.description: Model component as a nested model characteristic.

resource.name: StatisticModelValueCodeableConcept
resource.description: The specific value (when paired with code) as a CodeableConcept

resource.name: StatisticModelValueQuantity
resource.description: The specific value (when paired with code) as a Quantity

resource.name: StatisticModelValueRange
resource.description: The specific value (when paired with code) as a Quantity

resource.name: StudyEligibilityCriteria
resource.description: Profile of Group for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The StudyEligibilityCriteria Profile is used to describe inclusion and exclusion criteria for a clinical trial or other research study.

resource.name: StudyGroup
resource.description: Profile of Group for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The StudyGroup Profile is used to represent an enumerated group of participants in a research study.

resource.name: SummaryOfFindings
resource.description: Profile of Composition for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The SummaryOfFindings Profile is used for an evidence report combining Evidence and EvidenceVariable Resources, organized around OutcomeVariable (Profile of EvidenceVariable), to represent the summary of findings of comparative evidence.

resource.name: SummaryOfNetEffect
resource.description: Profile of Composition for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The SummaryOfNetEffect Profile is used for an evidence report combining ArtifactAssessment and Evidence and EvidenceVariable Resources, organized around OutcomeVariable (Profile of EvidenceVariable), to represent the summary of net effect contributions of comparative evidence, adjusted for the relative importance of outcomes.

resource.name: SystematicReviewEligibilityCriteria
resource.description: Profile of Group for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The SystematicReviewEligibilityCriteria Profile is used to describe inclusion and exclusion criteria for a systematic review.

resource.name: SystematicReviewExcludedStudies
resource.description: Profile of Library for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The SystematicReviewExcludedStudies Profile is used to represent the subset of search results of a systematic review which did not meet the inclusion criteria.

resource.name: SystematicReviewIncludedStudies
resource.description: Profile of Library for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The SystematicReviewIncludedStudies Profile is used to represent the subset of search results of a systematic review which meet the inclusion criteria.

resource.name: VariableDefinition
resource.description: Profile of EvidenceVariable for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The VariableDefinition Profile uses a CodeableReference Datatype to provide a concept (e.g. coding in a code system) and/or a reference to a Group Resource for structured data to define the variable.

resource.name: VariableDefinitionComparatorCategory
resource.description: The reference value used for comparison.

resource.name: VariableDefinitionRoleSubtype
resource.description: Sub-classification of the role of the variable.

resource.name: VariableDefinitionVariableRoleCode
resource.description: Classification of the role of the variable.

resource.name: WebPageCitation
resource.description: Profile of Citation for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The WebPageCitation Profile is used for citations of a web page or website, typically when there is not another type being used to classify the cited artifact.
